Soy Shredded Tri-tip

instant pot
beef

Ingredients

Beef

  • 2-3 lbs tri tip roast

Sauce Mixture

  • 1/3 cup soy sauce
  • 1/4 cup white vinegar
  • 1/4 cup olive oil
  • 1/4 cup Worcestershire sauce
  • 2 tsp brown sugar
  • 1 tbsp minced garlic
  • 1 tsp oregano
  • 1 tsp dried basil
  • 1 tsp onion powder

Procedure

  1. Chunk tri-tip into roughly 2" pieces
  2. Saute on high to get good sear on a few faces of the beef chunks
  3. Add the Sauce Mixture to the pan and scrape up any browned bits on the pan
  4. Pressure cook on high for 45 minutes
  5. 10 minutes natural release
  6. Remove meat from the pressure cooker and shred.
  7. Bring cooking liquid to simmer and reduce slightly
  8. Ladle some cooking liquid back over shredded beef and stir to combine
